block.p: DIAL CORP., Scottsdale, Ariz., said it cut its quarterly dividend 50 percent as part of its strategy to repay debt associated with acquisitions.
LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP., Los Angeles, had its $5 million offer to settle claims accepted by about 350 residents of Burbank, Calif., who say chemicals from the company's plants made them sick.

WELLS FARGO & CO. San Francisco, the bank holding company, received antitrust clearance to buy Brenton Banks Inc., after agreeing to sell three branches in Des Moines, the Justice Department said.
